segments.text: What's the matter with my wife ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She had a sudden heart attack .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess so . It was very terrible when she was at the onset of the illness . I am worried that I would lose her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don â€™ t worry . She is much better now . But you are not permitted to disturb her at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . But is she out of danger now ?
segments.speaker: S1
